query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

category.title: big data
category.displayCode: /natural sciences/computer and information sciences/data science/big data

category.displayCode: /social sciences/economics and business/business and management/business models

category.displayCode: /natural sciences/computer and information sciences/data science/data exchange

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

programme.title: Digital tools for enhancing the uptake of digital services in the energy market

result.title: Verification protocol for EU ETV, EU ETV Verification report
result.description: This document will describe the protocol and result of ETV Verification. The ETV Verification is performed to document the effectiveness of the Alpha Line system. The ETV verification is done to verify the high CO2 removal efficiency of the Alpha Line Gas Balance Filter, the high nitrogen waste (ammonia) removal efficiency of the Alpha Line Biofilter Units, and the water flow capacity between 950 -1000 m3/h.

result.title: Final Life Cycle Assessment
result.description: This document will report the methodology and results of the Environmental and social LCA. Several relevant environmental impact indicators will be quantified, e.g. for greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions, acidification, eutrophication, toxicity or ozone formation, or depletion impacts. Regarding social impact, indicators relevant for rural communities will be investigated, e.g. the number of new jobs created, public health etc.

category.title: recycling
category.displayCode: /engineering and technology/environmental engineering/waste management/waste treatment processes/recycling

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: Roadmap for exploitation
result.description: This document will describe the road map for exploitation. The road map will be an updated strategy for exploitation of the results generated in the project. It will contain a market assessment for the feedstocks and products of the AQUA-COMBINE concept and business plans for the industries involved (in connection to WP10). An important element will also be an assessment of risks in relation to business processes or particular business cases and development of potential risk mitigation plans.

result.title: AQUACOMBINE workshop
result.description: A dedicated Workshop will be organised to disseminate and validate AQUA-COMBINE outcomes at the end of the project. It will include presentation of the AQUA-COMBINE technologies and a discussion about the relevant exploitation strategy. Participants will be invited from interested local authorities, key scientists, as well as policy makers within Europe, targeting as many Member States as possible, but also including representatives from outside Europe. A special training seminar will be organised and will operate as a driver for the training of future end users. To ensure wide-scale knowledge and technology transfer, partners will structure dedicated training programs for internal research staff as well as other partners in the Consortium.

category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.

result.title: GLACIATION IPR Management, Business Models, and Business Plan - intermediate
result.description: This document will provide the market analysis, exploitation strategy and business plans of the consortium as a whole and per each participant to the project. This report will also include the advances with respect to the open-source strategy outlined in this proposal as the open nature of the project needs to be sustained after the end of the project. This report will be complemented with the IPR registry that will be continuously managed and that will include updated licenses of the GLACIATION environment.
